I would like to draw your attention to a WARC implementation by the
folks a=
t dsi.unimi.it.  Massimo Santini did the bulk of the work.  It
was written =
to go against the 0.9 version of the WARC specification
with a focus on per=
formance.  It requires MG4J and fastutils. Massimo
says comments or questio=
ns are welcome (santini at dsi etc).

The general idea is that you create e=
ither a WARCRecord or a
GZWarcRecord and then use it to read or write data.=
  See the code in
the examples subpackage.

I've attached binary and source=
 to the files of this mailing list up
on yahoo.

St.Ack
